recipesJson.name: (#DMC Milk Challenge) Queen Catherine

recipesJson.description:
Enjoy

This is my recipe for the DIY Mixers Crew milk challenge

Why did I name it Queen Catherine?
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Catherine_of_Braganza
